title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.2 - Responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.2 - Responsibility

State Regulations
(a) The owner shall
be responsible for the observance, and punishable for the non-observance, of
the following sections, anything in any lease to the contrary notwithstanding, namely: 8-2.3, 8-2.4, 8-2.5, 8-2.6, 8-2.7, 8-2.8, 8- 2.9, 8-2.12, 8-2.13, 8-2.14, 8-2.15, 8-2.16, 8-2.17, 8-2.18, 8-2.19, 8-2.20, 8- 2.21, 8-2.22, 8-2.23, 8-2.24, 8-2.25, 8-2.26, 8-2.27, 8-2.28, 8-2.29 (except: subd. [e], par. [2]; subd. [g], par. [4]), 8-2.30 (except: subd. [f], pars. [4- 6]). (b) The tenant shall be responsible for the
observance and punishable for the non-observance of the following sections, namely: 8-2.10, 8-2.30 (subd. [f], pars. [4-6]). (c) Both the owner and tenant shall be
responsible for the observance, and punishable for the non-observance, of the
following sections, anything in the lease to the contrary notwithstanding, namely: 8-2.11, 8-2.29 (subd. [e], par. [2]; subd. [g], par. [4]). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
